culture.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society
culture.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
I love working abroad and meeting people from different cultures.
A brief history of Western culture.
Business is one of the major forces in modern culture.
culture.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the attitudes and beliefs about something that are shared by a particular group of people or in a particular organization
culture.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Every government department has its own particular culture.
the drug culture that is destroying so many young lives today
Changing the corporate culture is a long and difficult process.
In the field of drug development, the culture of secrecy is deep and strong.
culture.translation[0].definitions[2].de: activities that are related to art, music, literature etc
culture.translation[0].definitions[2].no: culture vulture informal (=someone who is very interested in art, music, literature etc)
culture.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: If it’s culture you’re looking for, the city has plenty of museums and art galleries.
culture.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a society that existed at a particular time in history
culture.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: This technique was then adapted and refined by the more sophisticated cultures of the ancient world.
culture.translation[0].definitions[4].de: bacteria or cells grown for medical or scientific use, or the process of growing them
culture.translation[0].definitions[4].ex: It takes two to three weeks to grow the culture.
culture.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: Our society was heavily influenced by Greek and Roman culture.
Sport is a major part of our national culture.
The local culture of the island has much to interest visitors.
Britain and America are united by a common culture.
The people have a traditional culture which has hardly changed in 500 years.
Computers are a part of modern culture.
What are the values of the dominant culture?
culture.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to grow bacteria or cells for medical or scientific use
culture.translation[2].definitions[0].de: the ideas, beliefs, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a society
culture.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Western culture places a high value on material wealth.
culture.translation[2].definitions[1].de: the attitudes or beliefs that are shared by a particular group of people or in a particular organization
culture.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: Working late hours seems part of the company culture.
Can he transform their corporate culture from overstaffed public administration to profit-minded entrepreneurship?
We have to change our management culture to compete in Asia.
culture.translation[2].definitions[2].de: activities that are related to art, music, literature etc
culture.translation[2].definitions[2].ex: If it’s culture you’re looking for, the city has plenty of museums and art galleries.
